meanings.definition: A person who compiles or edits a miscellany.
meanings.sent1: The miscellanists gathered various poems and stories for the anthology.
meanings.sent2: The group of miscellanists worked together to create a diverse collection of writings.
meanings.sent3: The miscellanists decided to include a recipe for banana bread in their book of short stories.
meanings.sent4: She was a miscellanist of memories, piecing together fragments of the past into a coherent whole.
meanings.sent5: The miscellanists' library was a treasure trove of literary gems.
